title: Why I can't leave a comment or up/downvote in lolesports comment section?
body: title. Whenever I try to participate, it says "so sad...you are not authorized". I verified my email and all. why is this happening?

replies.body: Well, boards says you are level 2. I believe you have to be level 30, I assume to prevent spam.
Damn...I no longer enjoy playing this game...I enjoy watching it more. Riot can you please fix this problem??

This is intended and is not a bug or technical issue. Each subboard has its own rules regarding what level requirements are to participate. Here in Help & Support, the level requirement is 0. I recommend hopping on another account that is higher level or leveling up this account by playing the game.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
